sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions, Button, Typography, Grid, Box, Divider, IconButton, Chip, List, ListItem, ListItemText, ToggleButtonGroup, ToggleButton, Tooltip } from '@mui/material'; import { Close as CloseIcon, Download as DownloadIcon, CheckCircle as CheckCircleIcon, Terrain as TerrainIcon, Public as GlobeIcon, WbSunny as SunnyIcon, Cloud as CloudIcon, Timeline as TimelineIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { ColVisualization3D } from '../../cols/ColVisualization3D'; /** * Composant pour afficher les détails d'un col dans une boîte de dialogue */ const ColDetailsDialog = ({ open, col, onClose, onExportTrack, onMarkAsCompleted, onAddToChallenge, isSelected, isCompleted, maxColsReached, exportFormat, onExportFormatChange, weatherData }) => { const { t } = useTranslation(); if (!col) return null; return ( {col.name} {/* Informations générales */} {t('cols.details')} {t('cols.location')}: {col.region}, {col.country} {t('cols.altitude')}: {col.altitude} m {t('cols.length')}: {col.length} km {t('cols.avg_gradient')}: {col.gradient}% {t('cols.max_gradient')}: {col.maxGradient || '-'}% {t('cols.difficulty')}: {/* Description */} {col.description && ( {t('cols.description')} {col.description} )} {/* Météo */} {weatherData && ( {t('cols.current_weather')} {weatherData.isGoodWeather ? ( ) : ( )} {weatherData.condition} {t('cols.temperature')}: {weatherData.temperature}°C {t('cols.wind')}: {weatherData.wind} km/h {t('cols.humidity')}: {weatherData.humidity}% )} {/* Histoires et anecdotes */} {col.stories && col.stories.length > 0 && ( {t('cols.stories')}
    {col.stories.map((story, index) => (
  • {story}
    • ))}
)} {/* Points d'intérêt */} {col.pointsOfInterest && col.pointsOfInterest.length > 0 && ( {t('cols.points_of_interest')} {col.pointsOfInterest.map((poi, index) => ( ))} )} {/* Visualisation 3D */} {t('cols.profile_visualization')} {/* Utilisation du composant de visualisation 3D existant */} {/* Bouton d'exportation */} newFormat && onExportFormatChange(newFormat)} size="small" sx={{ mr: 1 }} > GPX TCX {/* Bouton pour marquer comme complété */} {isSelected && ( )} ); }; export default ColDetailsDialog;
